title: U.S. blasts China for 'Orwellian nonsense'
text:
U.S. blasts China for 'Orwellian nonsense' Monday, May 07, 2018 - 01:49
The White House criticizes China's efforts to force foreign airlines to change how they refer to Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau, calling Beijing's latest effort to police global language about the politically sensitive areas ''Orwellian nonsense.'' China's answer: that's the cost of business here.
The White House criticizes China's efforts to force foreign airlines to change how they refer to Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau, calling Beijing's latest effort to police global language about the politically sensitive areas "Orwellian nonsense." China's answer: that's the cost of business here. //in.reuters.com/video/2018/05/07/us-blasts-china-for-orwellian-nonsense?videoId=424661837&videoChannel=13423
